description: Over the last month, Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Office users have been experiencing "30088-27" errors when attempting to update the application. [...]
title: Microsoft 365, Office users hit by wave of ‘30088-27’ update errors

description: The seemingly legitimate online marketplace Huione Guarantee is being used as a platform for laundering money from online scams, especially "pig butchering" investment fraud, researchers say. [...]
title: Huione Guarantee exposed as a $11 billion marketplace for cybercrime

description: GitLab warned today that a critical vulnerability in its product's GitLab Community and Enterprise editions allows attackers to run pipeline jobs as any other user. [...]
title: GitLab: Critical bug lets attackers run pipelines as other users

description: The latest variants of the ViperSoftX info-stealing malware use the common language runtime (CLR) to load and execute PowerShell commands within AutoIt scripts to evade detection. [...]
title: ViperSoftX malware covertly runs PowerShell using AutoIT scripting

description: ​CISA and the FBI urged software companies on Wednesday to review their products and eliminate path OS command injection vulnerabilities before shipping. [...]
title: CISA urges devs to weed out OS command injection vulnerabilities

description: Japan's Computer Emergency Response Team Coordination Center (JPCERT/CC) is warning that Japanese organizations are being targeted in attacks by the North Korean 'Kimsuky' threat actors. [...]
title: Japan warns of attacks linked to North Korean Kimsuky hackers

description: Microsoft fixed a Windows zero-day vulnerability that has been actively exploited in attacks for eighteen months to launch malicious scripts while bypassing built-in security features. [...]
title: Windows MSHTML zero-day used in malware attacks for over a year

description: A large-scale fraud campaign with over 700 domain names is likely targeting Russian-speaking users looking to purchase tickets for the Summer Olympics in Paris. [...]
title: Ticket Heist fraud gang uses 700 domains to sell fake Olympics tickets

description: A large-scale fraud campaign with over 700 domain names is likely targeting Russian-speaking users looking to purchase tickets for the Summer Olympics in Paris. [...]
title: Ticket Heist network of 700 domains sells fake Olympic Games tickets

description: Google announced today that passkeys are now available for high-risk users when enrolling in the Advanced Protection Program, which provides the strongest level of account security. [...]
title: Google Advanced Protection Program gets passkeys for high-risk users
